00001 using System;
00002 using libsvm;

00004 /* Conversion notes (Andrew Poh):
00005  * Removed nested call of Streamreader constructor - original Java used BufferedReader
00006  * wrapped around FileReader.
00007  * 
00008  * Removed SupportClass because duplicated in svm library.
00009  * 
00010  * Replaced System.Console.arraycopy() with Array.Copy - this stemmed from a lousy
00011  * conversion of System.arraycopy().
00012  * 
00013  * Replaced System.Math.Max() with System.Math.Max().
00014  * 
00015  * Replaced (ArrayList)vx.addElement() in read_problem() with Add().

00018 class svm_train
00019 {
00020         private svm_parameter param; // set by parse_command_line
00021         private svm_problem prob; // set by read_problem
00022         private svm_model model;
00023         private System.String input_file_name; // set by parse_command_line
00024         private System.String model_file_name; // set by parse_command_line
00025         private System.String error_msg;
00026         private int cross_validation = 0;
00027         private int nr_fold;
00028         
00029         private static void  exit_with_help()
00030         {
00031                 System.Console.Out.Write("Usage: svm_train [options] training_set_file [model_file]\n" + "options:\n" + "-s svm_type : set type of SVM (default 0)\n" + "       0 -- C-SVC\n" + "       1 -- nu-SVC\n" + "      2 -- one-class SVM\n" + "       3 -- epsilon-SVR\n" + " 4 -- nu-SVR\n" + "-t kernel_type : set type of kernel function (default 2)\n" + "       0 -- linear: u'*v\n" + "        1 -- polynomial: (gamma*u'*v + coef0)^degree\n" + "     2 -- radial basis function: exp(-gamma*|u-v|^2)\n" + "  3 -- sigmoid: tanh(gamma*u'*v + coef0)\n" + "-d degree : set degree in kernel function (default 3)\n" + "-g gamma : set gamma in kernel function (default 1/k)\n" + "-r coef0 : set coef0 in kernel function (default 0)\n" + "-c cost : set the parameter C of C-SVC, epsilon-SVR, and nu-SVR (default 1)\n" + "-n nu : set the parameter nu of nu-SVC, one-class SVM, and nu-SVR (default 0.5)\n" + "-p epsilon : set the epsilon in loss function of epsilon-SVR (default 0.1)\n" + "-m cachesize : set cache memory size in MB (default 40)\n" + "-e epsilon : set tolerance of termination criterion (default 0.001)\n" + "-h shrinking: whether to use the shrinking heuristics, 0 or 1 (default 1)\n" + "-b probability_estimates: whether to train a SVC or SVR model for probability estimates, 0 or 1 (default 0)\n" + "-wi weight: set the parameter C of class i to weight*C, for C-SVC (default 1)\n" + "-v n: n-fold cross validation mode\n");
00032                 System.Environment.Exit(1);
00033         }
00034         
00035         private void  do_cross_validation()
00036         {
00037                 int i;
00038                 int total_correct = 0;
00039                 double total_error = 0;
00040                 double sumv = 0, sumy = 0, sumvv = 0, sumyy = 0, sumvy = 0;
00041                 double[] target = new double[prob.l];
00042                 
00043                 svm.svm_cross_validation(prob, param, nr_fold, target);
00044                 if (param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
00045                 {
00046                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
00047                         {
00048                                 double y = prob.y[i];
00049                                 double v = target[i];
00050                                 total_error += (v - y) * (v - y);
00051                                 sumv += v;
00052                                 sumy += y;
00053                                 sumvv += v * v;
00054                                 sumyy += y * y;
00055                                 sumvy += v * y;
00056                         }
00057                         System.Console.Out.Write("Cross Validation Mean squared error = " + total_error / prob.l + "\n");
00058                         System.Console.Out.Write("Cross Validation Squared correlation coefficient = " + (((prob.l * sumvy - sumv * sumy) * (prob.l * sumvy - sumv * sumy)) / ((prob.l * sumvv - sumv * sumv) * (prob.l * sumyy - sumy * sumy))) + "\n");
00059                 }
00060                 else
00061                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
00062                                 if (target[i] == prob.y[i])
00063                                         ++total_correct;
00064                 System.Console.Out.Write("Cross Validation Accuracy = " + 100.0 * total_correct / prob.l + "%\n");
00065         }
00066         
00067         private void  run(System.String[] argv)
00068         {
00069                 parse_command_line(argv);
00070                 read_problem();
00071                 error_msg = svm.svm_check_parameter(prob, param);
00072                 
00073                 if ((System.Object) error_msg != null)
00074                 {
00075                         System.Console.Error.Write("Error: " + error_msg + "\n");
00076                         System.Environment.Exit(1);
00077                 }
00078                 
00079                 if (cross_validation != 0)
00080                 {
00081                         do_cross_validation();
00082                 }
00083                 else
00084                 {
00085                         model = svm.svm_train(prob, param);
00086                         svm.svm_save_model(model_file_name, model);
00087                 }
00088         }
00089         
00090         [STAThread]
00091         public static void  Main(System.String[] argv)
00092         {
00093                 svm_train t = new svm_train();
00094                 t.run(argv);
00095         }

00097         private static double atof(System.String s)
00098         {
00099                 return System.Double.Parse(s);
00100         }
00101         
00102         private static int atoi(System.String s)
00103         {
00104                 return System.Int32.Parse(s);
00105         }

00107         private void  parse_command_line(System.String[] argv)
00108         {
00109                 int i;
00110                 
00111                 param = new svm_parameter();
00112                 // default values
00113                 param.svm_type = svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR;
00114                 param.kernel_type = svm_parameter.RBF;
00115                 param.degree = 3;
00116                 param.gamma = 0; // 1/k
00117                 param.coef0 = 0;
00118                 param.nu = 0.5;
00119                 param.cache_size = 40;
00120                 param.C = 1;
00121                 param.eps = 1e-3;
00122                 param.p = 0.1;
00123                 param.shrinking = 1;
00124                 param.probability = 0;
00125                 param.nr_weight = 0;
00126                 param.weight_label = new int[0];
00127                 param.weight = new double[0];
00128                 
00129                 // parse options
00130                 for (i = 0; i < argv.Length; i++)
00131                 {
00132                         if (argv[i][0] != '-')
00133                                 break;
00134                         ++i;
00135                         switch (argv[i - 1][1])
00136                         {
00137                                 
00138                                 case 's': 
00139                                         param.svm_type = atoi(argv[i]);
00140                                         break;
00141                                 
00142                                 case 't': 
00143                                         param.kernel_type = atoi(argv[i]);
00144                                         break;
00145                                 
00146                                 case 'd': 
00147                                         param.degree = atof(argv[i]);
00148                                         break;
00149                                 
00150                                 case 'g': 
00151                                         param.gamma = atof(argv[i]);
00152                                         break;
00153                                 
00154                                 case 'r': 
00155                                         param.coef0 = atof(argv[i]);
00156                                         break;
00157                                 
00158                                 case 'n': 
00159                                         param.nu = atof(argv[i]);
00160                                         break;
00161                                 
00162                                 case 'm': 
00163                                         param.cache_size = atof(argv[i]);
00164                                         break;
00165                                 
00166                                 case 'c': 
00167                                         param.C = atof(argv[i]);
00168                                         break;
00169                                 
00170                                 case 'e': 
00171                                         param.eps = atof(argv[i]);
00172                                         break;
00173                                 
00174                                 case 'p': 
00175                                         param.p = atof(argv[i]);
00176                                         break;
00177                                 
00178                                 case 'h': 
00179                                         param.shrinking = atoi(argv[i]);
00180                                         break;
00181                                 
00182                                 case 'b': 
00183                                         param.probability = atoi(argv[i]);
00184                                         break;
00185                                 
00186                                 case 'v': 
00187                                         cross_validation = 1;
00188                                         nr_fold = atoi(argv[i]);
00189                                         if (nr_fold < 2)
00190                                         {
00191                                                 System.Console.Error.Write("n-fold cross validation: n must >= 2\n");
00192                                                 exit_with_help();
00193                                         }
00194                                         break;
00195                                 
00196                                 case 'w': 
00197                                         ++param.nr_weight;
00198                                         {
00199                                                 int[] old = param.weight_label;
00200                                                 param.weight_label = new int[param.nr_weight];
00201                                                 Array.Copy(old, 0, param.weight_label, 0, param.nr_weight - 1);
00202                                         }
00203                                         
00204                                         {
00205                                                 double[] old = param.weight;
00206                                                 param.weight = new double[param.nr_weight];
00207                                                 Array.Copy(old, 0, param.weight, 0, param.nr_weight - 1);
00208                                         }
00209                                         
00210                                         param.weight_label[param.nr_weight - 1] = atoi(argv[i - 1].Substring(2));
00211                                         param.weight[param.nr_weight - 1] = atof(argv[i]);
00212                                         break;
00213                                 
00214                                 default: 
00215                                         System.Console.Error.Write("unknown option\n");
00216                                         exit_with_help();
00217                                         break;
00218                                 
00219                         }
00220                 }
00221                 
00222                 // determine filenames
00223                 
00224                 if (i >= argv.Length)
00225                         exit_with_help();
00226                 
00227                 input_file_name = argv[i];
00228                 
00229                 if (i < argv.Length - 1)
00230                         model_file_name = argv[i + 1];
00231                 else
00232                 {
00233                         int p = argv[i].LastIndexOf((System.Char) '/');
00234                         ++p; // whew...
00235                         model_file_name = argv[i].Substring(p) + ".model";
00236                 }
00237         }
00238         
00239         // read in a problem (in svmlight format)
00240         
00241         private void  read_problem()
00242         {
00243                 /* UPGRADE_TODO: Expected value of parameters of constructor
00244                  * 'java.io.BufferedReader.BufferedReader' are different in the equivalent in .NET.
00245                  * 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1092"'
00246                  */
00247                 System.IO.StreamReader fp = new System.IO.StreamReader(input_file_name);
00248                 System.Collections.ArrayList vy = new System.Collections.ArrayList(10);
00249                 System.Collections.ArrayList vx = new System.Collections.ArrayList(10);
00250                 int max_index = 0;
00251                 
00252                 while (true)
00253                 {
00254                         System.String line = fp.ReadLine();
00255                         if ((System.Object) line == null)
00256                                 break;
00257                         
00258                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(line, " \t\n\r\f:");
00259                         
00260                         vy.Add(st.NextToken());
00261                         int m = st.Count / 2;
00262                         svm_node[] x = new svm_node[m];
00263                         for (int j = 0; j < m; j++)
00264                         {
00265                                 x[j] = new svm_node();
00266                                 x[j].index = atoi(st.NextToken());
00267                                 x[j].value_Renamed = atof(st.NextToken());
00268                         }
00269                         if (m > 0)
00270                                 max_index = System.Math.Max(max_index, x[m - 1].index);
00271                         vx.Add(x);
00272                 }
00273                 
00274                 prob = new svm_problem();
00275                 prob.l = vy.Count;
00276                 prob.x = new svm_node[prob.l][];
00277                 for (int i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
00278                         prob.x[i] = (svm_node[]) vx[i];
00279                 prob.y = new double[prob.l];
00280                 for (int i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
00281                         prob.y[i] = atof((System.String) vy[i]);
00282                 
00283                 if (param.gamma == 0)
00284                         param.gamma = 1.0 / max_index;
00285                 
00286                 fp.Close();
00287         }
00288 }
